channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16932] Implement small scan
item.description: As said in HBASE-16838, we should have a scan method that returns a CompletaFuture for the whole result. It is suitable for a small scan.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: stack Yu Li FYI.

-1 overall

I think this a good first cut. I think calling it as it is – smallScan – is the way to go. Get another opinion given this is going to be public API (Yu Li?)
+1, makes sense to have a new "smallScan" API for async call, and current API lgtm. Thanks.
Let me fix the findbugs and javadoc warnings and try precommit again.

Duo Zhang This just went in and should fix the old findbugs issue:

commit bbe88d942ec4ac673cdaf266d4bf7e15d2b334d8
Author: Michael Stack <stack@apache.org>
Date: Tue Oct 25 14:44:11 2016 -0700

HBASE-16944 Fix findbugs warning in hbase-server HRegion UL_UNRELEASED_LOCK
Fix the javadoc and findbugs warnings.
Missed the new UT.

Thanks stack and Yu Li for reviewing.

Reopen for fixing the findbugs issue.

https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/4219/artifact/patchprocess/branch-findbugs-hbase-client-warnings.html

Seems the precommit job here didn't find out the issue?
Oh, it is introduced in HBASE-16886.

255	      System.arraycopy(nextRow, row.length, MAX_BYTE_ARRAY, 0, MAX_BYTE_ARRAY.length);

What's the intention of the above copy ?

Isn't the last MAX_BYTE_ARRAY.length bytes of nextRow left uninitialized after the copy ?
Oh the src and dst are inversed. Let me push an addendum to fix it. Thanks for pointing it out.
Fix the incorrect System.arraycopy.

Pushed the addendum to master.

Thanks Ted Yu.

FAILURE: Integrated in Jenkins build HBase-Trunk_matrix #1872 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/1872/)
HBASE-16932 addendum fix incorrect System.arraycopy (zhangduo: rev 9607409fca41edf9484876ddff8bbd6ee9becae5)

  • (edit) hbase-client/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/ConnectionUtils.java
Can you post a small example on how this should be used?

You can see the testcase here

https://github.com/apache/hbase/blob/master/hbase-server/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/client/TestAsyncTableSmallScan.java
